titles.title: Comprehensive Fentanyl Control Act
Comprehensive Fentanyl Control Act
To improve the ability of the Federal Government to address synthetic opioids, and for other purposes.
Comprehensive Fentanyl Control Act

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on the Judiciary, and Oversight and Government Reform, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Energy and Commerce
Referred to House Oversight and Government Reform
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, Homeland Security, and Investigations.

committee.subcommittee: Crime, Terrorism, Homeland Security, and Investigations
committee.name: House Judiciary
